name: BackroomsBlarg
description: Work in progress Backrooms themed first person shooter I'm working on while still learning the Unity engine as I go. This is mostly a prototype with the gameplay and enemies being built off of the tutorial first person shooter that comes with Unity. This is more of a prototype for the Backrooms level itself, and will probably not stay as a first person shooter like this. May transform into a multiplayer Halo Infection like game with this setting.
